name: Nest of Nightmares
modifiers: +20% Chance to inflict Spiders on Melee Hit per equipped Weaver's Will ItemSpiders are a debuff which add 5% chance to be critically hit. It stacks up to 4 times and lasts 4 seconds.

lore: "I was surrounded by golden silk, curious creatures, and Her words filling my very soul." - Masque, the Acolyte of Golden Silk
